title: Strategic Video Design for Smart Device-Based Science Learning

context.additional_context: Science curriculum implementing project-based assessment in a restricted technological environment centered on smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can analyze science videos applying strategic facial exposure techniques to explain cognitive load minimization strategies
Learners can produce 3-minute science explanation videos following video production principles that control visual distraction factors
Learners can write a report (over 500 characters) comparing learning effects under social cue retention/non-retention conditions in project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
